title: Provides for the prohibition of sale of tobacco products at pharmacies
summary: Provides for the prohibition of sale of tobacco products at pharmacies and pharmacy departments.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3329

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. HOYT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Health

       AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to  sale  of  tobacco
         products in pharmacies

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The public health law is amended by adding  a  new  section
    2  1399-dd-1 to read as follows:
    3    S  1399-DD-1. SALE OF TOBACCO PRODUCTS IN PHARMACIES.  NO PERSON SHALL
    4  SELL TOBACCO PRODUCTS IN A PHARMACY OR IN A RETAIL ESTABLISHMENT, IF:
    5    1. A PHARMACY AS A DEPARTMENT, AS SUCH TERM IS DEFINED IN PARAGRAPH  F
    6  OF SUBDIVISION TWO OF SECTION SIXTY-EIGHT HUNDRED EIGHT OF THE EDUCATION
    7  LAW, IS WHOLLY CONTAINED WITHIN SUCH ESTABLISHMENT; OR
    8    2.  CUSTOMERS  OF THE PHARMACY MUST PASS THROUGH A CORRIDOR OR AN AREA
    9  OWNED, LEASED OR CONTROLLED BY THE RETAIL ESTABLISHMENT AND USED  EXCLU-
   10  SIVELY TO ACCESS THE PHARMACY.
   11    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
   12  have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08057-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to sale of tobacco products in pharmacies
